verses.verse: זְב֣וּבֵי <WH2070> ze-Vu-vei flies מָ֔וֶת <WH4194> Ma-vet, Dead יַבְאִ֥ישׁ <WH887> yav-'Ish a stinking savour יַבִּ֖יעַ <WH5042> yab-Bi-a' to send forth שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> She-men cause the ointment רוֹקֵ֑חַ <WH7543> ro-Ke-ach; of the apothecary יָקָ֛ר <WH3368> ya-Kar him that is in reputation מֵחָכְמָ֥ה <WH2451> me-cha-che-Mah for wisdom מִכָּב֖וֹד <WH3519> mik-ka-Vod [and] honour סִכְל֥וּת <WH5531> sich-Lut folly מְעָֽט׃ <WH4592> me-'At. תְּחִלַּ֥ת <WH8462> te-chil-Lat The beginning דִּבְרֵי־ <WH1697> div-rei- of the words פִ֖יהוּ <WH6310> Fi-hu of his mouth סִכְל֑וּת <WH5531> sich-Lut; [is] foolishness וְאַחֲרִ֣ית <WH319> ve-'a-cha-Rit and the end פִּ֔יהוּ <WH6310> Pi-hu, of his talk הוֹלֵל֖וּת <WH1948> ho-le-Lut madness רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> ra-'Ah. [is] mischievous

וְהַסָּכָ֖ל <WH5530> ve-has-sa-Chal A fool יַרְבֶּ֣ה <WH7235> yar-Beh also is full דְבָרִ֑ים <WH1697> de-va-Rim; of words לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- No יֵדַ֤ע <WH3045> ye-Da' cannot tell הָאָדָם֙ <WH120> ha-'a-Dam a man מַה־ <WH4100> mah- what שֶׁיִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> shei-yih-Yeh, will happen וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher what יִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> yih-Yeh will come מֵֽאַחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> me-'a-cha-Rav, what shall be and what shall be after מִ֖י <WH4310> mi and who יַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> yag-Gid him who can tell לֽוֹ׃ lo.
